channel.title: Prejudice on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Prejudice on Simba Tango

item.title: Competition
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ Alaz- For some reason, people often assume I dance competitions when they hear I’m a tango dancer. Not so, I tell them. The only competition is to get to dance with the best dancers. And while I still believe that to be true to some extent, a friend (who is an excellent dancer himself), put me on a better track. Why is it so important to dance with the “best”, he asked.
